Trade/Device Name(s): GEN-PROBE® APTIMA® Assay for Chlamydia trachomatis
Specimen Container(s): APTIMA Specimen Transfer Kit transport tube
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for GEN-PROBE APTIMA Assay for Chlamydia trachomatis using nucleic acid amplification for detection of C. trachomatis rRNA in various specimen types, expanded to include PreservCyt liquid Pap specimens.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection of ribosomal RNA from Chlamydia trachomatis in clinician-collected and patient-collected swab specimens, urine, and gynecological specimens collected in PreservCyt Solution processed with the ThinPrep 2000 System, aiding in diagnosis of chlamydial urogenital disease.
